EmailTemplate.name: TE Deletion Notify Before 7days Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Targeting Engine {!EBH_Filter__c.Name} is about to expire in 7 days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EBH_Filter__c.OwnerFullName}, Your {!EBH_Filter__c.Name} is about to expire in 7 days.
That will mean that in 7 days you will not be able to use this Targeting Engine in any downstream processes (Reports, HIVE Analytics tables, Campaigns, etc.)
If you want to keep this Targeting Engine list for longer, please log in to HIVE and adjust Expiration date Best, HIVE team
